title: Structural Learning Theory (SLT)-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course applying SLT theory to actual mathematics instructional design for current practitioners

learning_goals: The core principles of Structural Learning Theory (SLT) can be explained and applied to mathematics education design
SLT-based mathematics learning modules can be developed using an integrated instructional design framework
SLT application cases can be analyzed through project-based assessments, and improvement strategies can be proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
